product_name: Pearl Izumi Elite In-R-Cool Tri Singlet - Men's
long_description: The Pearl Izumi Elite In-R-Cool Tri singlet is designed to keep you comfortable and well-vented through hours of intense activity. Moisture-wicking fabric blend offers formfitting support, and superior cooling and reflective sun protection. Elite Aero fabric is strategically placed for superior aerodynamics. Fabric provides UPF 50+ sun protection, shielding skin from harmful ultraviolet rays. 10 in. zipper provides instant ventilation. 2 easy-access envelope pockets in back. Flatlock seams reduce abrasion, and ensure a streamlined look and feel. The Pearl Izumi Elite In-R-Cool Tri singlet is formfitting.
